item.title: The Mac App Store
item.author: Craig Buchanan,
item.description: The iOS App Store: over 250,000 apps and more than 6.5 billion downloads onto 120 million iPads, iPhones and iPod touches, which are themselves growing, at a rate of 230,000 devices per day. The numbers are staggering, even more so when you consider that the store is only two years old; the App â€¦
